alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 12 at 12:44PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Two to three feet of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Mercer, Gloucester, Camden and Northwestern Burlington. In Pennsylvania, Delaware, Philadelphia and Lower Bucks. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding may become severe enough to cause some structural damage along with widespread roadway flooding near tidal waterways. Some locations may become isolated by the flood waters. At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs along tidal waterways. Some roads become impassable. Minor damage to vulnerable structures may begin to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread minor flooding is now forecast to occur with this afternoon`s high tide, so this Warning will now go into effect starting this afternoon. Strong southerly winds are forecast to increase tonight, which is forecast to lead to another round of moderate to major coastal flooding impacts along the tidal Delaware River beginning with the overnight high tide tonight. Due to additional fresh water runoff and persistent southwest winds, moderate to major flooding is forecast to persist through the Saturday afternoon high tide as well. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Burlington MLLW Categories - Minor 9.3 ft, Moderate 10.3 ft, Major 11.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 12/03 PM 9.9 2.2 2.0 Minor 13/03 AM 10.4 2.7 3.9 Moderate 13/04 PM 11.4 3.7 3.5 Major 14/04 AM 9.4 1.7 2.8 Minor 14/04 PM 10.0 2.3 2.4 Minor 15/05 AM 9.1 1.4 2.4 None Delaware River at Philadelphia MLLW Categories - Minor 8.2 ft, Moderate 9.2 ft, Major 10.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 12/02 PM 8.3 1.6 1.9 Minor 13/03 AM 9.0 2.3 3.8 Minor 13/03 PM 10.0 3.3 3.6 Moderate 14/03 AM 7.4 0.7 2.1 None 14/04 PM 7.9 1.2 1.6 None 15/04 AM 6.7 0.0 1.3 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
